item.title: STDS x1 - Triggers of AWS Lambda

item.description: Systematic Trading Done Serverless (STDS) x1 - Introduces all kinds of lambda triggers, which is at the heart of serverless event driven design

item.title: Systematic Trading Done Serverless (2) - Lambda
item.author: FunCoder
item.description: (STDS) Part 2 - Compute with Lambda. What is lambda? Why using lambda? How to use lambda? and downside of lambda.
